    • Constructor Detail

      • PlaneView

        public PlaneView()
        Class constructor, Creates GL Canvas, Adds GL Canvas to JPanel. Sets UI defaults (Layout, Size). Adds MouseMotion Listener to enable dragging of UI element and snapping to 260px grid.

    • Method Detail

      • display

        public void display(javax.media.opengl.GLAutoDrawable drawable)
        Gets GL2 Object from GLAutoDrawable object to enable Drawing of GL geometry. Translates GL canvas. Rotates GL origin based on xRotation, yRotation, zRotation values. ie. Plane rotation. Draws body of plane with drawCuboid method. Ends and Flushes GL Object when drawing is finished.
        Specified by:
        display in interface javax.media.opengl.GLEventListener
        Parameters:
        drawable -

      • dispose

        public void dispose(javax.media.opengl.GLAutoDrawable drawable)
        Auto generated dispose Method. Unused.
        Specified by:
        dispose in interface javax.media.opengl.GLEventListener
        Parameters:
        drawable -

      • init

        public void init(javax.media.opengl.GLAutoDrawable drawable)
        Initialisation, Gets GL2 Object from GLAutoDrawable object to enable Drawing of GL geometry. Sets Clear Color, Clear depth. Enables GL Depth Test. Sets GL Depth Function. Adds Anti-Aliasing and Perspective correction.
        Specified by:
        init in interface javax.media.opengl.GLEventListener
        Parameters:
        drawable -

      • reshape

        public void reshape(javax.media.opengl.GLAutoDrawable drawable,
                    int x,
                    int y,
                    int width,
                    int height)
        Reshape method, Called on program start, Resize, Reshaping of window. Maps the new size of the window with glViewPort based on width and height parameters. Sets Matrix mode of GL object. Sets Perspective of GL window.
        Specified by:
        reshape in interface javax.media.opengl.GLEventListener
        Parameters:
        drawable -
        x -
        y -
        width -
        height -
